708033f-a.text:
Third Avenue, at the N. W. corner of East 30th Street, showing the Madison Square Church House-Free Gospel & Social Center.  King's Handbook of N.Y. 1893 (pg.369) refers to this as an activity of the (former) Madison Square Presbyterian Church at 24th Street.

The writer believes that this authority has been relegated to the 1st Presbyterian Church since the dismemberment of the original sponsor.

Views 1,2-April 30, 1930

P. L. Sperr

708032f-a.text:
3rd Avenue, East side, north from 30th Street, showing where the elevated Gowanns Parkway will be constructed. All the buildings that stood here were demolished. View 2 shows the northeast corner of the Third Avenue and 33rd Street.
P. . Sperr  April 21, 19411
NO REPRODUCTIOE  Views 1,2
